page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Most people are in employment although nationally there is much unemployment. Farming and associated industries account for most of the jobs. So there are farm_workers,gamekeepers,drivers who deliver feed_stuffs,etc.
There are lots of jobs outside farming such as teaching,joinery,building to name just a few.Locally people are employed at the school in a variety of work.There is a cook,a non_teaching assistant,a caretaker and a secretary.
Quite a few people work at the local Inn.Many are part_time helpers who only come when the pub is busy or has a function. This provides work for some of the house-wives. Other house- wives do work such as cleaning for others and home_help.
